definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
bucket/(trash) can/barrel (of oil etc)/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: When I take a shower, he grabs a magazine and sits on the toilet, reading.
sentences.chinese: 我洗澡時他拿了本雜誌進來坐在馬桶上念。

sentences.english: When the utility model is used, shaped sterilized sanitary pad paper is glued on the seat pad of a sitting closet.
sentences.chinese: 使用時將成型的消毒衛生墊紙貼在馬桶的坐墊上面。

sentences.english: You can use it repair a leaky toilet, or to fix a crack on a toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 可以用它修補漏水的馬桶，修理馬桶座圈的裂縫。

sentences.english: You can use it repair a leaky toilet, or to fix a crack on a toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 可以用它修補漏水的馬桶，修理馬桶座圈的裂縫。

sentences.english: To make matters worse, Mr Berntsen Larsen quickly threw up after entering the tank, which was standing room only.
sentences.chinese: 更糟的是，他一進入僅有立足之地的馬桶就吐了。

sentences.english: Sucre stands at the toilet but it won’t flush.
sentences.chinese: Sucre發現馬桶不能沖水了，起了疑心。

sentences.english: Don't put anything but toilet paper in the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 除了捲紙，不要把什麼東西都放在馬桶裏。

sentences.english: Because people always sit in the closestools in washrooms .
sentences.chinese: 因爲在洗手間裏人們坐在馬桶上。

sentences.english: Thousand and thousand of peopel come to visit the Museum of Qin Terra-Cotta Warriors and Horses every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有成千上萬的人來參觀泰兵馬桶博物館。

sentences.english: During a phone interview the candidate flushed the toilet while talking to hiring manager.
sentences.chinese: 應聘者在一次電話面試外邊和招聘經理談話邊衝馬桶。

sentences.english: There' s a stain on the toilet seat, and the floor was wet and slippery.
sentences.chinese: 馬桶座圈上有一點瑕疵，地板又溼又滑的。

sentences.english: Energy efficient Central Air, Dual paned windows, water saving toilets and showers.
sentences.chinese: 高效節能的中央空調，雙格窗口，節水馬桶和淋浴。

sentences.english: The now-clean cat will rocket out of the toilet, and run outside where he will dry himself.
sentences.chinese: 煥然一新的貓將衝出馬桶，跑到屋外把自己弄乾。

sentences.english: In short, we need to reinvent the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 簡而言之，我們需要徹底改造馬桶。

sentences.english: What was sweeter: winning your first title or beating Liverpool in the cup final?
sentences.chinese: 拿下第一個聯賽冠軍和刷馬桶哪個更爽一點？

sentences.english: He complained there weren't even any hot showers or flush toilets.
sentences.chinese: 他抱怨連熱水浴跟抽水馬桶都沒有。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
